movies.title: SMS
movies.plot: 9:00 Laurent receives a text. 9:01 His cell phone gets stolen. 9:30 His son disappears 10:00 His house burns down. 10:15 His wife leaves him. 10:30 His company is liquidated. 11:00 he gets arrested. And this is just the beginning.
movies.simplePlot: 9:00 Laurent receives a text. 9:01 His cell phone gets stolen. 9:30 His son disappears 10:00 His house burns down. 10:15 His wife leaves him. 10:30 His company is liquidated. 11:00 he gets arrested. And this is just the beginning.

biography.bio: Guillaume de Tonquédec is an actor, known for Fais pas ci, fais pas ça (2007), The Double Life of Veronique (1991) and What's in a Name? (2012).
biography.name: Guillaume de Tonquédec

biography.bio: Géraldine Pailhas was born on January 8, 1971 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France. She is an actress, known for Don Juan DeMarco (1994), Young & Beautiful (2013) and They Came Back (2004). She is married to Christopher Thompson. They have two children.
biography.name: Géraldine Pailhas

biography.bio: Anne Marivin was born on January 23, 1974 in Senlis, Oise, Picardie, France. She is an actress, known for Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis (2008), Les petits mouchoirs (2010) and Aux yeux des vivants (2014).
biography.name: Anne Marivin

biography.bio: Franck Dubosc was born on November 7, 1963 in Le Petit-Quevilly, Seine-Maritime, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Franck Dubosc au Zénith - Romantique (2005), Pour toi, public (2003) and Il était une fois... Franck Dubosc (2009). He has been married to Danièle since June 19, 2009. They have one child.
biography.name: Franck Dubosc

biography.bio: Philippe Lefebvre is an actor and director, known for Tell No One (2006), OSS 117: Cairo, Nest of Spies (2006) and Mon idole (2002).
biography.name: Philippe Lefebvre

biography.bio: Like many actors, Julien Boisselier began in theater and then in the series he shot for the first time for television " Group Night " . Noticed in 1996 in the saga summer France 2 " In a large wind flowers", then revealed in the TV movie " Willingly or unwillingly ," the actor had no trouble seducing viewers ... It then turns many dramas "Summer beetles ", " The second truth ", " The Night of Murder ", " The one who left" ... Since then, he landed his first role in 2000 in " N7 " . Immediately after " Clara et moi ", " J'me not feel beautiful ", " We're going to love ", " It's a pleasure for me," " Please Do not you worry goest ",and roles, like Charles Gaessler , a young mentally disabled man in 2006 in the TV movie " Flowers for Algernon " in which he is particularly moving . In 2010, he plays Henry IV and, in a comedy "In the happiness of men." In 2011, he appeared in the series " Death at Edelweiss" with Claire Keim and continues with the series of TF1 " Cheers Colo " alongside Virginia Hocq and Titoff ,also in the film "White Night " by Frédéric Jardin alongside Tomer Sisley and Joey Starr. And in 2012 " The Chef " Daniel Cohen with Michael Youn and Jean Reno . In 2012, he also turns to France 2 " Brothers and Sisters" , a TV movie with Arbillot Pascale and Thierry Frémont . Film on TV, from comedy to drama , he can play everything and loves above all the diversity of roles .
biography.name: Julien Boisselier

biography.bio: Timothé Vom Dorp is an actor, known for Suzanne (2013), Chocolat (2016) and Dans la forêt (2016).
biography.name: Timothé Vom Dorp

biography.bio: Naidra Ayadi is an actress and director, known for Polisse (2011), Zim and Co. (2005) and Les gazelles (2014).
biography.name: Naidra Ayadi

biography.bio: Oleg Kupchik is an actor, known for Dans la cour (2014), SMS (2014) and Obmenyaytes koltsami (2012).
biography.name: Oleg Kupchik

biography.bio: Vinciane Millereau is an actress and director, known for Versailles: The Dream of a King (2008), Elle s'appelait Sarah (2010) and Respire (2014).
biography.name: Vinciane Millereau

biography.bio: Aurélia Petit is known for her work on The Science of Sleep (2006), Personal Shopper (2016) and Looking for Cheyenne (2005).
biography.name: Aurélia Petit

biography.bio: Eriq Ebouaney was born on October 3, 1967 in Angers, Maine-et-Loire, France. He is an actor, known for Kingdom of Heaven (2005), Hitman (2007) and Le transporteur 3 (2008).
biography.name: Eriq Ebouaney

biography.bio: Philippe Uchan is known for his work on 9 mois ferme (2013), My Mother's Castle (1990) and Les saveurs du Palais (2012).
biography.name: Philippe Uchan

biography.bio: Côme Levin was born on September 11, 1989. He is an actor and cinematographer, known for The Family (2013), Radiostars (2012) and Des morceaux de moi (2012).
biography.name: Côme Levin

biography.bio: Alka Balbir is an actress, known for Gaz de France (2015), 24 Days (2014) and Cauchemar du perdeur de clés (2006).
biography.name: Alka Balbir
